resources.string: Multiple selection, week starts on sunday, horizontal scrolling, shows in and out dates.
Month header view, single selection, week starts on monday, vertical scrolling, hides in and out dates.
Event style implementation, day labels as header view, single selection, month scroll listener. Similar to what is in the Google Calendar app.
Continuous selection within one month and across multiple months. Similar to what is in the Airbnb app.
